# 

# Membership Showcase 2023/2024

**[](http://web.archive.org/web/20250917011924/https://saac-arts.org/artist-exhibit-entry-form/)2 Pieces per Artist**  
**Free for all SAAC Members  
New Artists Welcome to Join**

Select your two favorite works, created at any point in your lifetime and bring them for the show.

**DELIVER ENTRIES by  
NOVEMBER 30**

[Online Entry Form](http://web.archive.org/web/20250917011924/https://saac-arts.org/artist-exhibit-entry-form/)

Gallery Exhibit:  
**December 4-17  
**Art Reception:  
**Saturday, December 14, 5:30-7:00pm**

Again this year – anything goes! With the exhibit being a showcase and not a competition don't miss this opportunity to select your two favorite works, created at any point in your lifetime, and bring them for the Membership Showcase. **_Artwork must not have previously shown at SAAC in Membership Show is the only rule._** There's no competition or cash awards, but you can sell your work if you wish.

* * *

# 2023/2024 Prospectus

##### **ENTRY/FEE** : Limit 2 pieces per artist / FREE. SAAC members may submit two entries for free. New artists are welcome to become a member and submit artwork. We love our artists and can't wait to exhibit your artwork.

##### **EXHIBITION** : The show will be on display December 4-17, 2023 in the SAAC galleries.
